entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. 60 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain in the morning. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
